Detailed Description

Author: Bob Buehler, Matt Dissinger, Kyle Owen

Compiler: Windows: MinGW / Linux: GNU G++

Project: GNAT

Description: This file contains the declaration of the CPuzzleGraph class, which stores the actual data of a puzzle, and the structures which represent the puzzle nodes and spans.
